short_instructions.2-3 Artist 12:
Create a circle to finish the eyeball!\
\
If
the artist turns 1 degree with each loop, how many times do you need to repeat
the code to draw a circle? 180? 360? 500?
short_instructions.2-3 Artist 2 new:
This house has a half-finished wall. Each side
is 100, but the half-finished wall is only 50. Complete the wall.
short_instructions.2-3 Artist 4: Help me complete the house for this cat.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 2A: This time, use a loop to gather all of the nectar.
short_instructions.2-3 Bee Loops 3A: Use a `repeat` loop to collect all of the nectar.
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 2: This pig is ruffling my feathers. Help me get to him!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze 6:
Keep calm and help me find the bad pig. Otherwise
I might get angry!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops 17: Use what you learned to get me to the sunflower!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops 20:
Get me to the sunflower using the fewest number
of blocks possible!
short_instructions.2-3 Maze Loops Assessment 1:
Assessment:  Get me to the sunflower
using only 5 blocks!
short_instructions.4-5 Maze 6:
Get me to the sunflower using the fewest number
of blocks possible!

short_instructions.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY: Get the Agent to the pressure plate, then press "Run" and use the arrow keys to move the player out of the house to collect the chest.

short_instructions.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_2020: Get the Agent to the pressure plate, then press "Run" and use the arrow keys to move the player out of the house to collect the chest.

short_instructions.Overworld Avoid Monsters: Running into a Creeper is a bad idea. Carefully move past the Creepers and reach the safety of your home.
short_instructions.Overworld Avoid Monsters_2019: Running into a Creeper is a bad idea. Carefully move past the Creepers and reach the safety of your home.
short_instructions.Overworld Avoid Monsters_2020: Running into a Creeper is a bad idea. Carefully move past the Creepers and reach the safety of your home.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Tree: Wood is a very important resource. Many things are made from it. Walk to the tree and use the "destroy block" command to chop it down.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Tree_2019: Wood is a very important resource. Many things are made from it. Walk to the tree and use the "destroy block" command to chop it down.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Tree_2020: Wood is a very important resource. Many things are made from it. Walk to the tree and use the "destroy block" command to chop it down.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Trees: We need to build a house before the sun goes down. Houses require a lot of wood. Cut down all 3 trees.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Trees_2019: We need to build a house before the sun goes down. Houses require a lot of wood. Cut down all 3 trees.
short_instructions.Overworld Chop Trees_2020: We need to build a house before the sun goes down. Houses require a lot of wood. Cut down all 3 trees.
short_instructions.Overworld Free Play 20x20: Congratulations! You've completed all our puzzles! Now mine, build, and create something unique by using everything you've learned so far.

short_instructions.Overworld Free Play 20x20_2020: Congratulations! You've completed all our puzzles! Now mine, build, and create something unique by using everything you've learned so far.
short_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep: Add a second "move forward" command to reach the sheep.
short_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep_2019: Add a second "move forward" command to reach the sheep.
short_instructions.Overworld Move to Sheep_2020: Add a second "move forward" command to reach the sheep.
short_instructions.Overworld Place Wall: Every house starts with a wall. Build the first part of your house by putting the "place" and "move forward" commands inside the repeat loop.
short_instructions.Overworld Place Wall_2019: Every house starts with a wall. Build the first part of your house by putting the "place" and "move forward" commands inside the repeat loop.
short_instructions.Overworld Place Wall_2020: Every house starts with a wall. Build the first part of your house by putting the "place" and "move forward" commands inside the repeat loop.
short_instructions.Overworld Plant Crops: It’s good to plan ahead. Plant crops on both sides of the water so you don’t get hungry later on.
short_instructions.Overworld Plant Crops_2019: It’s good to plan ahead. Plant crops on both sides of the water so you don’t get hungry later on.
short_instructions.Overworld Plant Crops_2020: It’s good to plan ahead. Plant crops on both sides of the water so you don’t get hungry later on.
short_instructions.Overworld Powered Minecart: Great job! You’ve gathered lots of resources and built a modest home. Now lay rail from the edge of the map to the door of your house.
short_instructions.Overworld Powered Minecart_2019: Great job! You’ve gathered lots of resources and built a modest home. Now lay rail from the edge of the map to the door of your house.
short_instructions.Overworld Powered Minecart_2020: Great job! You’ve gathered lots of resources and built a modest home. Now lay rail from the edge of the map to the door of your house.
short_instructions.Overworld Shear Sheep: Sheep-shearing time! Use the "shear" command to gather wool from both sheep.
short_instructions.Overworld Shear Sheep_2019: Sheep-shearing time! Use the "shear" command to gather wool from both sheep.
short_instructions.Overworld Shear Sheep_2020: Sheep-shearing time! Use the "shear" command to gather wool from both sheep.
short_instructions.Underground Avoiding Lava: Lava is hiding beneath some of these blocks, which you'll need to cover up before moving forward. An "if" command will come in handy here. Add a "move forward" command in the correct place to mine these blocks.
short_instructions.Underground Avoiding Lava_2019: Lava is hiding beneath some of these blocks, which you'll need to cover up before moving forward. An "if" command will come in handy here. Add a "move forward" command in the correct place to mine these blocks.
short_instructions.Underground Avoiding Lava_2020: Lava is hiding beneath some of these blocks, which you'll need to cover up before moving forward. An "if" command will come in handy here. Add a "move forward" command in the correct place to mine these blocks.
short_instructions.Underground If Statements: Now things are getting tricky. Mine 3 redstone, but don’t fall into the lava. Use an "If" command to place cobblestone over any lava you uncover.
short_instructions.Underground If Statements_2019: Now things are getting tricky. Mine 3 redstone, but don’t fall into the lava. Use an "If" command to place cobblestone over any lava you uncover.
short_instructions.Underground If Statements_2020: Now things are getting tricky. Mine 3 redstone, but don’t fall into the lava. Use an "If" command to place cobblestone over any lava you uncover.
short_instructions.Underground Iron: Walking into molten lava is a bad idea. Place cobblestone to create a bridge, then mine at least two of the iron blocks.
short_instructions.Underground Iron_2019: Walking into molten lava is a bad idea. Place cobblestone to create a bridge, then mine at least two of the iron blocks.
short_instructions.Underground Iron_2020: Walking into molten lava is a bad idea. Place cobblestone to create a bridge, then mine at least two of the iron blocks.
short_instructions.Underground Mining Coal: You’ll find the most valuable resources underground, but it can get dark. Place at least 2 torches and mine at least 2 coal.
short_instructions.Underground Mining Coal_2019: You’ll find the most valuable resources underground, but it can get dark. Place at least 2 torches and mine at least 2 coal.
short_instructions.Underground Mining Coal_2020: You’ll find the most valuable resources underground, but it can get dark. Place at least 2 torches and mine at least 2 coal.
